summary: Give Lydia immortal, the Huscarls that grants you the Jarl of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffe599][u]Description[/u][/color]
[ENGLISH]
Give Lydia immortal, the Huscarls that grants you the Jarl of Whiterun.

[FRENCH]
Ce petit plugin rend Lydia le Husacarl que vous offre le Jarl de Blacherive, immortel.
Il est conçu pour les personnes qui n'ont pas accès à la console ou qui ne savent pas s'en servir.


[color=#ffe599][u]Installation[/u][/color]
1. Copy and paste the plugin from the extracted archive into "Skyrim\Data".
2. In Skyrim Launcher/NMM/Wrye Smash make sure "Immortal Lydia.esp" is checked.


[color=#ffe599][u]Uninstallation[/u][/color]
Delete the following files:
Immortal Lydia.esp


[color=#ffe599][u]F.A.Q[/u][/color]
Q: Can you offer the mod on the Workshop?
A: No, I find it particularly bad ergonomics workshop. I use very little.

Q: The mod will remain free?
A: Yes, my few creations that I share will always be free. Same for my translations.

Q: I want to offer you a coffee by the donations system, can you activate donations buttons on the page of the mod?
A: No, I'm not doing this for fame, endorsements, money or women. By cons do not hesitate to post a comment or screenshots related to the mod.

Q: Can I translated your mod or convert meshes for a different male or female body?
A: Of course, just give me a link for those who then pass first through the nexus. But then in this case there's not much to translate / convert :)
author: Sita
